section.name: About
section.p: TinyJEE is a zero conf, zero maintenance embeddable platform that has the major goal make the usage of JEE as easy as working with GRAILS while following a component oriented approach with minimized dependencies and main focus on POJO and Java config.

Note: If you're looking for a full blown, certified JEE application server, consider using something else.
TinyJEE's focus is to be simple, small and rapid development ready but not 100% standards compliance.
section.div: Note: This project is still in planning / drafting phase! It's not yet ready for usage.
